Rulings.Base: 1. You destroy your targeted card and return your opponent's targeted cards to the hand at the same time.\n2. If control of one or more of the targets is switched before this effect resolves, this effect does nothing.\n3. If your opponent controls the card you targeted to be destroyed when this effect resolves, it is not destroyed and you don't return any cards to your opponent's hand.
